snippet: Fast just got faster with Nexus S. A pure Google experience, Nexus S is the first phone to run Gingerbread (Android 2.3), the fastest version of Android yet.
The first smartphone with a 1.2 GHz processor and global capabilities.
The next generation of DOES.
The T-Mobile myTouch 4G is a premium smartphone designed to deliver blazing fast 4G speeds so that you can video chat from practically anywhere, with or without Wi-Fi.
Are you ready for everything life throws your way?
The Samsung Transform™ brings you a fun way to customize your Android powered touch screen phone to just the way you like it through your favorite themed “Sprint ID Service Pack”.
The T-Mobile G2 with Google is the first smartphone built for 4G speeds on T-Mobile's new network. Get the information you need, faster than you ever thought possible.
Motorola CHARM fits easily in your pocket or palm.  Includes MOTOBLUR service.
With its 1 GHz processor and Android 2.2 with Adobe Flash 10, the DROID 2 offers PC-like power and speed.
The Samsung Epic™ 4G delivers a premium entertainment experience through advanced 4G speeds and its innovative 4” touch display technology, which provides rich picture brilliance.
The Motorola Milestone delivers a richer web, smarter messaging, and top-of-line media features, all on the thinnest QWERTY slider available.
The Samsung Captivate™ delivers a cinema quality experience like you’ve never seen before. Its innovative 4” touch display technology provides rich picture brilliance, even outdoor
Changing the game, Motorola i1 brings PTT functionality into a touch screen design.
The Samsung Intercept™ is built to deliver a high-end Android experience, complete with full QWERTY keyboard, at a great price.
The Samsung Vibrant™ delivers a cinema quality experience like you’ve never seen before. Its innovative 4” touch display technology provides rich picture brilliance, even outdoors.
Your hand becomes a theater with the DROID X 4.3-in. hi-res screen and HD camcorder. An 8MP camera captures crisp images. Connect to a Wi-Fi hotspot or be one.
The Samsung Acclaim™ delivers a rich multimedia experience.  With a full QWERTY keyboard, crisp 3.2” touch screen, and access to thousands of apps to customize your phone.
This isn't some scaled-down, mobile version of the Internet. There's GPS-based weather, visual email, Google Maps Navigation™, Facebook, Flickr, YouTube - you name it.
With the HTC EVO, you’ve got the power to do more than you ever thought possible with a phone.
Introducing the Dell Streak, your pocket tablet has arrived.
The myTouch 3G Slide™ smartphone with Faves Gallery™, myModes and the Genius Button™ makes sure you don’t miss a thing.
HTC Desire delivers intense brilliance, sharp contrast, and true colors on the expansive 3.7-inch display.
Connect with your Ally.
With such attention to detail on the inside and out, the name of this phone pretty much says it all.
Watch. Listen. Play. The ultimate Android multimedia smartphone.
The Nexus One shows what's possible on mobile devices through Android when cool apps meet a fast, bright, and connected computer that fits in your pocket.
The Samsung Behold® II brings a seamless combination of entertainment and mobility into one with easy access to premium multimedia features through a brilliant AMOLED touch screen.
Take customization to a whole new level. Create and switch between scenes that reflect different moments in your life.
It's a pint-sized power plant. Location aware. Speech-recognizing. App-mashing and multitasking. With DROID by Motorola you'll connect at breakneck speed.
The Samsung Moment™ has a brilliant 3.2” widescreen AMOLED display that brings out the best of web browsing and the tens of thousands of apps available for download.
Everything you need for work and weekend. Make it your hero with personalization that lets you create a phone just right for you.
Phones can often define their users. With the HTC myTouch™, it’s the other way around. Experience the first phone that’s designed around the freedom of being you.
